506640.name: Burlesque
506640.description:
Step into the spotlight as the new manager of a struggling burlesque theatre.
Restore the venue. Recruit dazzling performers. Build relationships. Put on unforgettable shows.

In Burlesque, you’re not just running a theatre, you’re shaping the future of an entire troupe.

Balance finances, train dancers, keep the building presentable and deepen personal connections as you transform a fading venue into the most talked-about attraction in town.

Manage the Theatre

Every decision matters.

  • Set up weekly performances and improve show quality

  • Manage money, energy, and time across each day

  • Increase ticket sales through better performances and promotion

  • Expand your troupe and unlock new headliners

A stronger theatre means bigger crowds and bigger profits.

Build Your Troupe

Each dancer has her own personality, ambitions, and story.

  • Talk, flirt, and bond with performers

  • Give thoughtful gifts to improve relationships

  • Share meals to deepen trust

  • Unlock special events as your connection grows

  • Discover personal story arcs for every dancer

Stronger bonds lead to better performances and unforgettable nights on stage.

A Living Daily System

Spend your time wisely:

  • Train dancers

  • Clean and improve the theatre

  • Go shopping for gifts or outfits

  • Prepare meals

  • Trigger special character events
